text: 5.9-10 Hib 2.10, 5.6, 11.40 God ne takaw agak ak, Jisas mɨdupsek kɨdek gɨl gɨjuwak. Adek anɨb ak nep, God Jisas nop aglɨl agak, Melkisedek ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep ak, nad bɨ God nop sɨbogep anɨb ak tek mɨdeban agak. Pen binɨb Jisas takaw nop nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpal okok, ne bɨ kasɨn gep kɨli ak mɨdɨl, kɨlop tɨg asɨk dek pel pelnep yenɨgabal.
